attributes.action: Raise more awareness and benefits for Chronic Kidney Disease, Kidney Failure
attributes.additional_details: CKD is a very serious and life long Disease, it kills! Benefits such as P.I.P are hard to get and there is really no awareness out there. CKD has no cure only life treatments of dialysis and transplant which don't last forever. Many patients with CKD die before even receiving a transplant.
attributes.background: I have CKD, kidney failure and I've been rejected from P.I.P 3 times! My life is held together by peritoneal dialysis and cocktail of drugs. Unfortunately there is no cure for CKD. I noticed that there is not a lot of information in leaflet form about or much knowledge? We need more info, benefits
